Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: is it true that this table will take effect in 2019? it looks like you are only talking nonsense, I am not sure about the benefits you say, because crypto currencies are very volatile

Author: Ben4real
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: Given the volatility of the crypto industry, I suggest the team look into the table and make necessary adjustment so as not to discourage investors

Author: ND_INVEST
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: Quote from: Ben4real on November 15, 2018, 02:56:51 PM Given the volatility of the crypto industry, I suggest the team look into the table and make necessary adjustment so as not to discourage investors Hello. Thanks for your comments! The profit is calculated here based on the number of free tokens the person receives by the end of June. We calculated the number of weeks, multiplied it by the number of free weekly tokens and then calculated how much tokens it is in percentage from the amount of tokens this person bought. The price will not decrease until the end of the ICO, so if you turn out to have, say, 15% more tokens than you bought, that is 15% profit. It is the Proof of Stake kind of profit, so it doesn't really take into consideration the volatility, though. It's just about having more tokens than you bought.

Author: ND_INVEST
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: WHITEPAPER  |  WEBSITE  |  TWITTER  |  TELEGRAM    What is ND INVEST? ND INVEST is a platform for instant purchases of real estate, cars, furniture and services at discounted and promotional prices. By signing the preliminary purchase agreement and paying the deposit upfront using ND tokens via our application or web page, the customer retains the ownership right for the asset, the pre-approved price and conditions of the deal. The remaining part of the asset price the buyer pays in fiat or another cryptocurrency.   What does our program offer? Our program works primarily with real estate developers, car dealerships, furniture manufacturers and furniture stores. Urgent sale of assets by 3rd parties, as well as absence of any intermediaries guarantees low prices on our platform. Our system increases transaction transparency and payment liquidity, decreases barriers for asset purchases and document preparation, and simplifies procedures related to tax assessment of cross-border transactions.

Do not miss your chance to participate in our Airdrop! Mind that our token is a utility rather than security, so you'll be actually able to spend the tokens in the New Day system after the ICO! To be eligible for the Airdrop, you need accounts in the top social networks. Please complete the tasks and provide the proofs of doing so in this AIRDROP FORM. You can participate in the Airdrop only once. Any attempt to cheat will result in disqualification without a warning. Help us create a strong community! Let's bring NDCOIN to the MOON together!!!

Author: kryptqnick
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: This project looks fine to me. The company is now new and has some experience with cars and property, and I enjoy the graphical design of the Whitepaper. It's a shame that since many ICOs are scamming people, it's pretty hard to attract audience to new projects. I think you should do some more research about ways of promoting the project. Your social networks barely have subscribers and that's among the things people pay attention to when they evaluate projects. Keep in mind, though, that asking people to pump the ANN thread is forbidden by forum rules. Good luck!

Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST

After webinars in Russian, events for English-speaking community will follow. For now, I'd like to tell you more about webinars in Russian. Author: TimeTeller
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: Please add linkedin profiles of the CTO, COO and Marketing Director. Since your company is already established as stated from your website, their profile reference I believe is a must. Users who have no idea of their existence need at least legit profile links. And actually, you are not the first to venture in real-estate via blockchain technology. The problem with this kind of project is that there are so many restrictions if a foreigner wants to purchase property outside of his home country. It's not that easy and blockchain will not make that easier. Also, who are going to receive the referral bonuses if your ICO is not yet finished?

Author: ND_INVEST
Title: [ANN] [AIRDROP] [PRE-ICO] ND INVEST
Body: 1. Thanks for the first constructive reply in this thread! I'll talk with our CEO about linkedin profiles, but the problem is that they somehow managed this far without them.. Our COO created and took part in a lot of projects before that are operating till this day, but it never came to him that a linkedin or ANY social network profile is a must these days. CTO is among those people who sort of prefer to stay in the shadows and don't want there to be any information about them available online. I know it's a problem when we are talking about one of the most important people in the company and we'll try to do something here. Finally, our Marketing director was hired rather recently specifically for this project. Somehow, he also never felt importance of linkedin. You should understand that it's not that popular in third world countries and sometimes even the giants of arious industries don't have profiles there (a good example is the Chairman of the Board of Directors on the biggest cinema chain in Ukraine (30% of the market!) Anton Puhach, who created his first social profile account in facebook like a year ago). This is the problem with third-world countries. Business is still mainly done the old way... 2. Could you please provide examples of other real estate crypto projects? We've one analyzed about 10 of them, but they weren't even close to our project concept. And as for restrictions, we are working on it to make sure that everything is completely legal. That's why people will have to sign preliminary contracts even to reserve the right of further purchase of a product they chose. 3. As for referral payments, we have a Referral program for the period of ICO. People who invite others to buy our tokens will receive referral payments while the ICO is going and there will even be monthly prizes for those whose referral links led to biggest purchases of our tokens.  Quote from: icoscale on October 12, 2018, 03:44:30 AM Hey guys, good luck with ND INVEST  We invite you to submit your ICO to ICOscale (FREE!). https://icoscale.io/publish-ico/  Thanks. https://icoscale.io Thanks, we'll look into that!
